tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SatelliteImageAnalysis (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTEA,
    image_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    machine_learning_algorithm VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE machine_learning_algorithms (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_name VARCHAR(100),
    algorithm_version VARCHAR(50),
    training_dataset BYTEA,
    validation_dataset BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTEA,
    capture_date TIMESTAMP,
    location GEOMETRY
)

CREATE TABLE machine_learning_models (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name TEXT,
    training_data BYTEA,
    evaluation_metrics JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE urban_development_patterns (
    pattern_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_type TEXT,
    detection_accuracy FLOAT,
    pattern_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE image_ml_mapping (
    mapping_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id),
    model_id UUID REFERENCES machine_learning_models(model_id),
    detected_pattern_id UUID REFERENCES urban_development_patterns(pattern_id)
)
